ability.name: Berserker's Call
ability.des: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.Type: Active Armor bonus: 5 / 10 / 15 Duration: 2 / 3 / 4

ability.name: Nature's Attendants
ability.des: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 11 seconds.Number of Wisps: 3 / 5 / 7 Heal per Second per Wisp: 25

ability.name: Bloodlust
ability.des: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.Type: Active Attack Speed Bonus: 30 / 40 / 50

ability.name: Walrus Punch!
ability.des: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.Type: Active Critical Damage: 300% / 350% / 400% Air Time: 1

ability.name: Hunter's talent
ability.des: Increase attack damage and speed for drow ranger.Type: Passive Bonus damage and attack speed: 20% / 30% / 40%

ability.name: Shuriken Toss
ability.des: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target. Type: Active Damage: 300 / 500 / 700

ability.name: Battery Assault
ability.des: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.Type: Active Damage: 50 / 75 / 100 Duration: 5 Interval: 0.7

ability.name: Hex
ability.des: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.Type: Active Duration: 4 / 6 / 8

ability.name: Sticky Napalm
ability.des: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area. Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks. The extra damage is halved against creeps.Type: Active Bonus Damage: 50 / 75 / 100 Max Stacks: 4 / 7 / 10

ability.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
ability.des: Launches 3 rockets to hit random enemies.Type: Active Damage per Missile 250 / 350 / 450

ability.name: Mana Break
ability.des: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 50% of the mana burned as damage to the target.Type: Passive Mana per hit 30 / 60 / 90

ability.name: Toss
ability.des: Toss an enemy nearby, throw it to the farthest grid and stun.Type: Active Damage: 100 / 200 / 300 Duration: 1.5 / 2 / 2.5

ability.name: Arcane Aura
ability.des: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map.Type: Passive Mana Regen: 8 / 14 / 20 Regen Interval (seconds): 2

ability.name: Wild Axes
ability.des: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.Type: Active Damage per Axe: 70 / 110 / 150 Damage Amp per hit: 10 / 20 / 30 Duration: 10

ability.name: Blade Fury
ability.des: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.Type: Active Damage per second: 50 / 100 / 150 Duration: 5

ability.name: Whirling Death
ability.des: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies around him in an area.Type: Active Damage: 150 / 200 / 250

ability.name: Scream of Pain
ability.des: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.Type: Active Damage: 200 / 300 / 400

ability.name: Illusory Orb
ability.des: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way.Type: Active Damage: 150 / 200 / 250

ability.name: Paralyzing Cask
ability.des: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.Type: Active Damage: 50 / 75 / 100 Bounces: 5 / 7 / 9 Stun Duration: 1

ability.name: Corrosive Haze
ability.des: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.Type: Active Armor Reduction: 15 / 30 / 45 Duration: 20

ability.name: Chaos Bolt
ability.des: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.Type: Active Min Duration: 1 Max Duration: 2 / 3 / 4 Min Damage: 50 / 100 / 150 Max Damage: 200 / 300 / 400

ability.name: Leech Seed
ability.des: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.Type: Active Damage/Heal: 40 / 60 / 80 Duration: 4 / 6 / 8 Pulse Interval: 1.5

ability.name: Moon Glaives
ability.des: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.Type: Passive Bounces: 3 / 5 / 7 Damage reduction per bounce: 30%

ability.name: Nature's Call
ability.des: Call a treant from trees in border.Type: Active Treant HP: 300 / 500 / 700 Treant Damage: 30-50 / 50-70 / 70-90

ability.name: Waveform
ability.des: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.Type: Active Damage: 150 / 250 / 300

ability.name: Pounce
ability.des: Slark leaps forward to the back of the first enemy chess he connects with, dealing physical damage to the target and disarming the victim.Type: Active Damage: 200 / 300 / 400 Disarm Duration: 3 / 5 / 7

ability.name: Transform
ability.des: Transform into lupine form, gain more hp and summon 2 wolves. Wolves are Assassins.Type: Active Bonus Max HP: 20% / 30% / 40% Wolves HP: 300 / 500 / 700 Wolves Damage: 50-100 / 100-150 / 150-200

ability.name: Plague Ward
ability.des: Summon a plague ward to attack enemies.Type: Active Ward HP: 200 / 300 / 400 Ward Damage: 50-100 / 100-150 / 150-200 Attack Rage: 1.4 Attack Slow: 0.3

ability.name: Purification
ability.des: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.Type: Active Heal/Damage: 200 / 300 / 400

ability.name: Plasma Field
ability.des: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.Type: Active Min Damage: 10 Max Damage: 100 / 175 / 250 Radius: 400 / 450 / 500

ability.name: Powershot
ability.des: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%.Type: Active Damage: 400 / 600 / 800 Channel time: 2

ability.name: Coup de Grace
ability.des: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units.Type: Passive Proc Chance: 10% Critical Damage: 300 / 450 / 600

ability.name: Aphotic Shield
ability.des: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.Type: Active Damage Absorb: 100 / 150 / 200

ability.name: Burrowstrike
ability.des: Burrows into and tunnels forward to stun enemies.Type: Active Damage: 150 / 250 / 350 Duration: 2

ability.name: Assassinate
ability.des: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.Type: Active Damage: 400 / 600 / 800 Cast time: 1

ability.name: Viper Strike
ability.des: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.Type: Active Damage: 150 / 250 / 350 Attack Speed Reduction: 40 / 60 / 80 Duration: 5

ability.name: Requiem of Souls
ability.des: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.Type: Active Damage: 100 / 150 / 200 Souls: 12 / 16 / 20

ability.name: Laguna Blade
ability.des: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.Type: Active Damage: 500 / 750 / 1000

ability.name: Metamorphosis
ability.des: Terrorblade transforms into a teribble form becoming ranged and Sundering a friendly hero.Type: Active Bonus Damage: 50 / 100 / 200 Bonus Attack Speed: 50 / 75 / 100 Bonus Range: 600 Duration: 60

ability.name: Smoke Screen
ability.des: Throws down a smoke bomb at his current position, silencing enemies within 2 grids and causing them to miss some of their attacks.Type: Active Radius: 325 Miss Chance: 30 / 40 / 50 Duration: 3 / 4 / 5

ability.name: Sacred Arrow
ability.des: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision to an enemy chess in another chessboard currently under attack/defense from friendly chesses, dealing damage and stun to the target. Damage and stun duration increases with range.Type: Active Damage Min: 50 / 75 / 100 Damage Max: 500 / 750 / 1000 Stun Min: 1 / 1.5 / 2 Stun Max: 5 / 7.5 / 10 Distance for Max Stun/Damage: 6000

ability.name: Doom
ability.des: Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.Type: Active Damage per second: 60 / 90 / 120 Duration: 20

ability.name: Ghostship
ability.des: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.Type: Active Damage: 150 / 250 / 350 Stun Duration: 1.4 / 1.7 / 2

ability.name: Fervor
ability.des: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed. If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.Type: Passive Attack Speed per Stack: 15 / 20 / 25 Max Stacks: 6 / 9 / 12

ability.name: Illuminate
ability.des: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled. Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path. The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.Type: Active Damage per second: 100 / 150 / 200 Max Channel Time: 3

ability.name: Death Pulse
ability.des: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.Type: Active Heal/Damage: 100 / 150 / 200

ability.name: Refraction
ability.des: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage. The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.Type: Active Instances: 4 / 6 / 8 Bonus Damage: 40 / 60 / 80 Duration: 6

ability.name: Chemical Rage
ability.des: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing hp regeneration.Type: Active Base Attack Time: 0.7 / 0.55 / 0.4 Health Regem: 40 / 60 / 80 Duration: 60

ability.name: Static Storm
ability.des: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.Type: Active Duration: 2 / 3 / 4 Pulses: 8 / 12 / 16 Max DPS: 100 / 150 / 200 Radius: 400 / 500 / 600

ability.name: Stone Gaze
ability.des: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed. If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone. Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical damage.Type: Active Duration: 4 / 5 / 6 Stone Duration: 2 / 3 / 4 Radius: 600 / 800 / 1000 Bonus Physical Damage: 30

ability.name: Elder Dragon Form
ability.des: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, granting him new powers. LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures. LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a radius, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets. LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.Type: Active Bonus Damage: 100 / 150 / 200 Corrosive Breath DPS: 30 / 30 / 30 Splash Radius: 0 / 300 / 300 Frost Attack Speed Reduction: 0 / 0 / 30

ability.name: Summon Spirit Bear
ability.des: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that has Root ability.Type: Active Bear HP: 1200 / 1600 / 2000 Bear Damage: 150-200 / 250-300 / 350-400 Root Proc Chance: 25 Root Duration: 3

ability.name: Call Down
ability.des: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.Type: Active Damage per Missile: 200 / 300 / 400

ability.name: Chain Frost
ability.des: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units, slowing and damaging each time it hits.Type: Active Damage per bounce: 200 / 300 / 400 Bounces: 6 / 9 / 12 Slow: 65 Slow Duration: 2.5

ability.name: Ravage
ability.des: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.Type: Active Radius: 500 / 650 / 800 Stun Duration: 2 / 2.5 / 3 Damage: 150 / 250 / 350

ability.name: Midnight Pulse
ability.des: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.Type: Active Damage per second: 5% / 7% / 9% Duration: 10 Radius: 450

ability.name: Remote Mines
ability.des: Plants a bomb which will automatically explode after a while to deal large amount of damage.Type: Active Damage: 700 / 1100 / 1500 Explosion delay: 3 Radius: 600

ability.name: Exorcism
ability.des: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy chesses. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.Type: Active Spirits: 10 / 15 / 20 Spirit Damage: 100 Heal: 25%
